item.title: Test-Driven Development Quiz
item.author: mail@richardmillen.com (Richard Millen)
item.description: 1 Show Answer Outside of perhaps explaining a “why,” if you need a comment to explain your test, it stinks. function showAnswer(divId) { var x = document.getElementById(divId); if (x.style.display === 'none') { x.style.display = 'block'; } else { x.style.display = 'none'; } } 2 Show Answer Test-drive new behavior into your system in quite small increments. function showAnswer(divId) { var x = document.
